document_data.mainbody:
Rendilar Bluthlock was a member of the criminal underworld of Scornubel in the mid-14 century DR.
He wore boots.
In late , Tornar the Eye carried a message to Rendilar Bluthlock that he could spend freely, backed by Belgon Bradaskor, to send as many people to their deaths as he wished in hunting down Shandril Shessair. He led them in the hunt for spellfire. He was slain before the caravan arrived at Triel.
The men under his command were under the impression that one of the caravans people was a mage from the Cult of the Dragon who was also a double agent for the Arcane Brotherhood.
